[vc_row css_animation=”none” banner=”true” el_class=”banner-zinnia” el_id=”home”][vc_column el_class=”res-m-bttm-lg text-center text-lg-left”][vc_single_image image=”1481″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1620982834135{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”mouse”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

The World’s 1st Dog Themed Token That Rewards You, Whilst Giving Dogs a Home

If you like Doge, then you’ll fall in love with PUG

  • BUY PUG
  • VIEW CHART
  • CHECK BSCSCAN

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”none” el_id=”about” css=”.vc_custom_1620803375842{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”section-pad about-section no-pb section-bg”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Who is PUG?

PUG (Japanese: かぼす) is a female Shiba Inu most famously known as the face of Doge.

PUG was born in November 2nd, 2005 in a Japanese pedigree puppy mill that was promptly shut down, leaving PUG stranded in one of Japan’s many animal shelters. The owner of PUG, Atsuko Sato, rescued her in 2008, saving her from certain death at the hands of humanity. Her name was given by a shelter volunteer – PUG is a type of fruit and said rescue worker mentioned that her face was very round, just like the fruit.

The goal of PUG is to prevent dogs of all breeds from being abandoned. For this reason we will be making weekly donations to community chosen dog charities!

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1435″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes” el_class=”token-sale-section section-bg-zinnia” el_id=”tokenomics” css=”.vc_custom_1621009683661{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1621009235147{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”roadmap” el_class=”section-pad about-section no-pb section-bg”][vc_column el_class=”res-m-bttm”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Our Roadmap

[/vc_column_text]

PHASE 1

Releases:
- PUG (May 10th)
- Hikaru (TBC)

Listings:
- PUG & Hikaru Listed on CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and Centralized Exchange

Marketing:
- 1st round of Marketing Push
- Influencer promotional material

Operations:
- Voluntary donation to community chosen charities
- Debuting development of internal Decentralized Exchange
- Ecosystem development in partnership with BOGTOOLS

PHASE 2

Releases:
- 3rd Ecosystem integral Token

Listings:
- 3rd Token Listed on CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and Centralized Exchange

- Additional Centralized Exchanges for both PUG and Hikaru

Marketing:
- 2nd Round of Marketing Push
- More Influencer promotional material

Operations:
- Voluntary donation to community chosen charities
- Update on Decentralized Exchange development
- Ecosystem update 1
- Debuting development of INU Wallet

PHASE 3

Releases:
- 4th Ecosystem integral Token
- Decentralized Exchange

Listings:
- 4th Token Listed on CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and Centralized Exchange

- Additional Centralized Exchanges for 3rd token

Marketing:
- 3rd Round of Marketing Push
- More Influencer promotional material
- Partnership Establishment

Operations:
- Voluntary donation to community chosen charities
- Update on Decentralized Exchange development
- Ecosystem update 1
- Debuting development of INU Wallet

PHASE 4

Releases:
- 5th Ecosystem integral Token
- Staking Mechanism
- INU ECOSYSTEM
- Wallet
- Token Bridge

Listings:
-5th Token Listed on CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and Centralized Exchange

- Additional Centralized Exchanges for 4th token

Marketing:
- 4th Round of Marketing Push
- More Influencer promotional material
- Partnership Establishment

Operations:
- Voluntary donation to community chosen charities
- Debuting development of NFT MarketPlace
- Ecosystem update 3
- Decentralized Exchange Update 1
- Ecosystem integral Centralized Exchange development planning

PHASE 5

Releases:
- 6th Ecosystem integral Token
- NFT Marketplace

Listings:
- 6th Token Listed on CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and Centralized Exchange

- Additional Centralized Exchanges for 5th token
- TIER 1 Centralized Exchange application

Marketing:
- 5th Round of Marketing Push
- More Influencer promotional material
- Partnership Establishment

Operations:
- Voluntary donation to community chosen charities
- NFT sales-related charity donations
- Debuting development of Centralized Exchange
- Centralized Exchange legal aspect handling
- Ecosystem update 4
- Decentralized Exchange Update 2
- Ecosystem integral Centralized Exchange development planning

PHASE 6

WORLD DOMINATION
